is.merkor.core.database.data
Class SimilarityVerbObjRelation

java.lang.Object
  is.merkor.core.database.data.AbstractPersistentObject
      is.merkor.core.database.data.SimilarityVerbObjRelation
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistentObject, Relation, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Relation>
public class SimilarityVerbObjRelation
extends AbstractPersistentObject
implements Relation, java.io.Serializable

A class mapping to the table SIMILARITY_VERB_OBJECT in the MerkOr database. These relations are the result of a similarity computation based on verb-object relations in a corpus. In order to be able to treat a similarityVerbObjRelation like a LexicalRelation, it has a LexicalRelationType attribute with the default value hasObject.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir
See Also:

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a string representation of this similarityVerbObjRelation. It is composed as follows:

"[" + this.getClass().getName() + leftLemma + relationTypeName + rightLemma + (confidence) + "]"

compareTo

public int compareTo(Relation relation)
Compares two relations. The comparison is based on the confidence attributes, with these being equal, the pair attributes are compared, and at last, with these being equal, the id attributes are compared.

Specified by:
compareTo in interface Relation
Specified by:
compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Relation>
Returns:
the value 0 if the argument relation is equal to this similarityVerbObjRelation; a value less than 0 if this similarityVerbObjRelation's confidence is less than the argument's confidence, or, these being equal, if this similarityVerbObjRelation's pair is less than the argument's pair, or these being equal, if this similarityVerbObjRelation's id is less than the argument's id; and a value greater than 0 if this similarityVerbObjRelation's confidence is greater than the argument's confidence, or, these being equal, if this similarityVerbObjRelation's pair is greater than the argument's pair, or these being equal, if this similarityVerbObjRelation's id is greater than the argument's id;

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Compares the specified object with this object for equality. Returns true if and only if the specified object is also a SimilarityVerbObjRelation and this.compareTo(simVerbObjRelation2) == 0.

Overrides:

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Returns the hash code value for this similarityVerbObjRelation. The hash code of a similarityVerbObjRelation uses the hash code generator of HashCodeBuilder:

hashCode = new HashCodeBuilder().append(getId()).append(getPair()).append(getConfidence()).toHashCode())

Overrides:
hashCode in class AbstractPersistentObject
Returns:
the hash code value for this similarityVerbObjRelation
